Package jam.data

Contains classes for representing histograms, gate conditions and scalers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RemoteData Remote interface for getting data from a Jam server process.
 

Class Summary
AllTests  
CalibrationFunction A function that can be use to calibrate a histogram.
DataBase Class that contains a staticmethod to clear the lists of all the data classes.
DataParameter Class for user-defined numerical parameters that can be used during sorting.
Gate A gate, used for data sorting, belongs to a histogram which determines what type of gate it is.
GateTest  
Histogram Class containing spectra and the routines to perform operations on them.
HistogramTest  
Monitor This class is for monitoring the status of data acquisition.
Scaler Class representing an individual scaler in the experiment.
 

Exception Summary
DataException Exception that can be thrown when unrecoverable error conditions occur in jam.data classes.
 

Package jam.data Description

Contains classes for representing histograms, gate conditions and scalers.
